sentences.english: This stone became the driving inspiration for the design, and is used with great dignity and respect.

definition: thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
simple and unadorned (of art, architecture etc)
simple and honest/unsophisticated/(music etc) deep and resounding
deep/profound/(of a person) reserved/undemonstrative/(of a voice, sound etc) deep/low-pitched
dense/thick (fog, clouds etc)/to have a strong interest in/deep/fully saturated (color)
